statements: SELECT * FROM threats WHERE threat_level > 5;
SELECT threat_type, threat_level FROM threats WHERE detection_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT threat_id, threat_description FROM threats WHERE threat_source = 'External';
SELECT * FROM threats WHERE detection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT threat_type, threat_description, threat_level FROM threats WHERE threat_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT * FROM threats WHERE threat_level > 5 ORDER BY threat_type DESC, detection_date ASC
SELECT threat_type, threat_description, threat_level FROM threats WHERE detection_date >= '2021-01-01' AND detection_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY threat_level DESC
SELECT threat_id, threat_type FROM threats WHERE threat_source = 'Internal' OR threat_source = 'External' ORDER BY threat_id
SELECT * FROM threats WHERE threat_type LIKE '%malware%' AND (threat_level = 10 OR threat_level = 5) ORDER BY detection_date DESC, threat_level ASC
SELECT threat_description, threat_type, detection_date FROM threats WHERE threat_type = 'Phishing' AND threat_level < 5 ORDER BY detection_date ASC
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE threat_type = 'Malware'
SELECT indicator_type, indicator_value FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE indicator_type = 'IP Address'
SELECT correlation_id, correlation_score FROM CorrelationAnalysis ORDER BY correlation_score DESC
SELECT indicator_value FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE source = 'FireEye' ORDER BY indicator_id ASC
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE indicator_type = 'Domain Name' AND threat_type = 'Phishing'
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE threat_type = 'Malware' ORDER BY indicator_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT correlation_id, correlation_score, timestamp FROM CorrelationAnalysis WHERE correlation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT indicator_id, indicator_type, indicator_value FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE source = 'External' ORDER BY indicator_type, indicator_id;
SELECT threat1_indicator_id, threat2_indicator_id, correlation_score FROM CorrelationAnalysis WHERE correlation_score < 0.5 ORDER BY correlation_score DESC, timestamp;
SELECT indicator_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM ThreatIntelligenceData GROUP BY indicator_type HAVING total_count > 5 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence;
SELECT indicator, description, threat_level FROM threat_intelligence WHERE threat_level = 'High';
SELECT source, threat_level FROM threat_intelligence WHERE source LIKE '%Symantec%';
SELECT id, indicator_type, description FROM threat_intelligence ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, threat_id, correlation_id, correlation_result FROM threat_intel_correlation;
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence;
SELECT indicator, source, threat_level FROM threat_intelligence WHERE threat_level = 'High';
SELECT indicator_type, description FROM threat_intelligence WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT source, threat_level, description FROM threat_intelligence WHERE threat_level = 'Critical' ORDER BY source ASC;
SELECT * FROM threat_intel_correlation INNER JOIN correlation_analysis ON threat_intel_correlation.correlation_id = correlation_analysis.id;
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelData;
SELECT threat_name, description, severity FROM ThreatIntelData WHERE severity > 7;
SELECT id, threat_name, date_reported FROM ThreatIntelData ORDER BY date_reported ASC;
SELECT source_name, source_type, contact_info FROM IntelSources WHERE source_type = 'external';
SELECT threat_id, correlation_score, date_analyzed FROM CorrelationAnalysis ORDER BY correlation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelData ORDER BY date_reported DESC;
SELECT threat_name, description, severity FROM ThreatIntelData WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT t.threat_name, s.source_name FROM ThreatIntelData t JOIN CorrelationAnalysis ca ON t.id = ca.threat_id JOIN IntelSources s ON ca.source_id = s.source_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_threats FROM ThreatIntelData WHERE description LIKE '%malware%';
SELECT actor_name, target_industry, known_tactics FROM ThreatActors WHERE date_identified BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceData;
SELECT source, severity, description FROM ThreatIntelligenceData ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT actor_name, country FROM ThreatActors WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT indicator_id, indicator_type, value FROM Indicators WHERE date_published >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT strategy_id, threat_id, strategy_description, effectiveness_rating FROM MitigationStrategies ORDER BY effectiveness_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT description, date_added FROM ThreatIntelligenceData WHERE severity <= 3 ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT T.actor_name, I.value, T.country FROM ThreatActors AS T INNER JOIN Indicators AS I ON T.actor_id = I.threat_id;
SELECT T.actor_name, M.strategy_description, M.effectiveness_rating FROM ThreatActors AS T INNER JOIN MitigationStrategies AS M ON T.actor_id = M.threat_id ORDER BY M.effectiveness_rating DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT T.actor_name, CA.result, CA.confidence FROM ThreatActors AS T INNER JOIN CorrelationAnalysis AS CA ON T.actor_id = CA.threat_id WHERE CA.confidence > 0.8 ORDER BY CA.confidence ASC;
